vision.notes: Sensory capabilities in Pyuridae are largely unstudied in the provided context. Vision presence or absence is not stated.

chemoreception.notes: As tunicates, Pyuridae likely possess chemoreception for filter feeding and other basic functions. This is inferred based on general tunicate biology.

mechanoreception.notes: As tunicates, Pyuridae likely possess mechanoreception for basic environmental awareness. This is inferred based on general tunicate biology.
